snippet: Friends described the 26-year-old, part of the team that treated Thomas Eric Duncan, as conscientious and caring, and from a very private family.
abstract: Friends of Dallas nurse Nina Pham describe the 26-year-old, part of the team that treated Thomas Eric Duncan, as conscientious and caring, and from a very private family.

byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood contributed reporting from Somerville, Mass., and Kevin Sack from Dallas.

lead_paragraph: Friends described the 26-year-old, part of the team that treated Thomas Eric Duncan, as conscientious and caring, and from a very private family.

headline.main: Ebola Puts Nina Pham, a Nurse Unaccustomed to the Spotlight, in Its Glare
headline.print_headline: Ebola Puts a Young Dallas Nurse Unaccustomed to the Spotlight in Its Glare
